roleset.name: to move or act at a high speed
roleset.note: HURRY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hurry' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from hurry.01-v predicate notes)
HURRY-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to hurry.01-v. Vn classes rush-53.2 and run-51.3.2. Framed by Katie. (from hurry.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Or that the president would have hurried [*-1] to sign the bill `` out of compassion for her plight '' ?
example.arg: [*-1] to sign the bill `` out of compassion for her plight ''

example.name: intransitive
example.text: On Main Street , Alida Verwoerd and her daughters look after the clothes and fabric shop , then hurry home [*-1] to fix lunch for the rest of the family .
example.arg: [*-1] to fix lunch for the rest of the family

example.name: Arg 2 is what your hurrying to do
example.text: a hurry to sell Saks, Marshall Field, or B.A.T's other U.S. retail properties
example.arg: to sell '' Saks , Marshall Field or B.A.T 's other U.S. retail properties

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: his hurry to till the land for growing crops
example.arg: to till the land for growing crops

roleset.name: hurry_up
roleset.note: HURRY_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia for BOLT.

example.name: hurry_up-v: harsh!
example.text: She is too old . She should hurry up .
